alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 6:52AM EST until December 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Carolina... Lumber River 1 SE Nichols affecting Dillon, Marion and Horry Counties. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River 1 se Nichols. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor flooding along River Road east of Nichols on the Horry County side of the river begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 20.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by late tonight.
